Title: Custom Time Only   SharePoint Field Control (SPTimeOnly)
Description:
Custom Time Only  Custom SharePoint Field Control . This Give Ability to Create user to Time only custom filed. This Simply save as Text Filed.
This give look and feel of the SharePoint Date Time control without it Date Picker part.

You can modify this control format to Save as
